snippet: John A. Catsimatidis, the billionaire supermarket magnate, was identified as one of several contenders who could potentially beat a Democratic nominee.
abstract: New York City's five Republican county chairmen say they hope to identify a candidate to run for mayor on the Republican line, holding that the likely Democratic candidates are too liberal for the average New York voter.
lead_paragraph: John A. Catsimatidis, the billionaire supermarket magnate, was identified as one of several contenders who could potentially beat a Democratic nominee.

headline.seo: New York City Republican Leaders Seeking Candidate for Mayor
headline.main: G.O.P. Leaders in City Seek Candidate for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Republican Leaders in City Seek Candidate for Mayor
